content.course_description: This intensive 3-day workshop is designed for experienced project coordinators and aspiring project leaders. It covers advanced project management methodologies, risk assessment techniques, stakeholder communication strategies, and the use of modern project management tools.
learning_objectives: Master advanced concepts in Agile and Waterfall methodologies.
Enhance stakeholder management and communication skills.
Gain proficiency in using tools like Azure DevOps Boards and Microsoft Project for complex projects.
Prepare for PMP certification exam topics.

details: Deep dive into Scrum vs. Kanban vs. Waterfall
Leveraging Azure DevOps for Project Tracking

target_audience: Team Leads aspiring to Project Leadership
prerequisites: Minimum 2 years of experience in a project environment
Basic understanding of project management principles
